plot: When his mother is attacked and killed by a lion, an infant boy named Boru is adopted by a passing tribe and raised by the tribe's chief. The young boy and the chief's son, Nikitu, grow up ...
title: Stampede
plot_es: When his mother is attacked and killed by a lion, an infant boy named Boru is adopted by a passing tribe and raised by the tribe's chief. The young boy and the chief's son, Nikitu, grow up ...
